Paragraph (6) states: ‘In its communication of 2 December 2015 “Closing the loop – An EU action
plan for the Circular Economy”, the Commission committed to taking a series of actions to
promote the reuse of treated waste water, including the development of a legislative proposal
on minimum requirements for water reuse.’
